articles.description: Football can be strange and unpredictable, writes Phil McNulty, but make no mistake - the Premier League title is Liverpool's.
articles.title: Liverpool win at Manchester City is result that seals the title

articles.description: Virat Kohli hits an unbeaten century as India beat Pakistan by five wickets in the Champions Trophy.
articles.title: India vs Pakistan: Virat Kohli's unbeaten century secures emphatic six-wicket victory in Champions Trophy

articles.description: Rangers sack manager Philippe Clement the day after a home loss to St Mirren left them 13 points behind Premiership leaders Celtic.
articles.title: Philippe Clement: Rangers sack manager a day after loss to St Mirren

articles.description: France score 11 tries to thrash Italy in a high-scoring contest to set up a potential Six Nations decider with Grand Slam-chasing Ireland.
articles.title: Italy 24-73 France: Visitors keep alive Six Nations title hopes

articles.description: Newcastle United striker Alexander Isak becomes the seventh-fastest player to reach 50 Premier League goals.
articles.title: Alexander Isak: Newcastle United striker hits 50-goal landmark

articles.description: Pep Guardiola says he sees a "bright future" for his Manchester City side, despite Sunday's 2-0 defeat by Liverpool.
articles.title: Man City 0-2 Liverpool: Pep Guardiola sees 'bright future' for side

articles.description: After every round of Premier League matches this season, Troy Deeney gives you his team of the week. Do you agree with his choices?
articles.title: Troy Deeney's Team of the Week: Ibrahima Konate, Bryan Mbeumo, Brennan Johnson, Lewis Miley

articles.description: How did Jannik Sinner’s drugs ban deal come about and where does it leave the fight against doping in tennis?
articles.title: Jannik Sinner: Tennis star's doping ban explored

articles.description: England needed the bounce of a ball in their victory over Scotland but they are getting rewards for their fight and resilience, writes Matt Dawson.
articles.title: Matt Dawson column: 'England want to entertain but winning is all-important'

articles.description: Fiorentina striker Moise Kean collapses on the pitch and is taken to hospital after sustaining a head injury during a 1-0 defeat at Hellas Verona.
articles.title: Moise Kean: Fiorentina striker taken to hospital after collapsing on the pitch
